title: RMC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 06 Pharmacist Posts
description: Rajkot Municipal Corporation (RMC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 06 Pharmacist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Pharm, D.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for the RMC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online before the last date of application. If you are look...
